fieldset.name: component
fieldset.label: Add user Frontend
fieldset.description: Change settings of Add user Frontend

field.name: operationmode
field.label: Mode
field.description: If you also want to insert the user in Community Builder you have to pick: CB and Joomla. If you want to use it for joomla only, choose: Only Joomla.

field.name: namemode
field.label: Namemode
field.description: Use firstname and lastname or only one field for the whole name.

field.name: unameexist
field.label: Check username
field.description: What do you want the component to do when the requested username already exists

field.name: emailexist
field.label: Check email
field.description: Do you want to check for double emails?

field.name: genericemail
field.label: Choose email address
field.description: Do you want to fill in the emailaddress manually or automaticly create generic emailadresses?

field.name: notificationemail
field.label: Email notification
field.description: Do you want to send a notification email with the userdata to the emailaddress of the user that has been added to Joomla/CB ?

field.name: adminnotificationemail
field.label: Admin email notification
field.description: Send an email to website administrator? (Sends an notification to the emailaddress in the global configuration: FROM EMAIL)
field.option: Dont send notification email to administrator

field.name: usertypemode
field.label: Choose usertype mode
field.description: This option allows you to choose a usertype from the backend or show a usertype listbox in the frontend. If you set frontend, the fields: Default User Group and Custom Group, will not be considered!

field.name: hiddenusertype
field.label: Hide standard usergroups
field.description: This option, if enabled, hides from the listbox of usertype selection (only in the Frontend) all of the default joomla groups (like administrator, registered and other group with id from 1 to 8 managed by Joomla)!

field.name: setusertype
field.label: Usertype
field.description: Which type of user do you want to add? BE CAREFULL WHEN YOU CHOOSE USERTYPES WITH A LOT OF PERMISSIONS!

field.name: custumgroup
field.label: Custom Group
field.description: Enter the ID of the usergroup to which you want to add the new user. TO USE THIS OPTION! - Set the usertype field above to: Custom Group. BE CAREFULL WHEN YOU CHOOSE USERTYPES WITH A LOT OF PERMISSIONS!
